definitions.definition: Filmed in a greater aspect ratio than the 1.33:1 or 1.37:1 aspect ratio .
Presented in the original aspect ratio; presented in letterbox orientation .

main_definition: ( film ) Filmed in a greater aspect ratio than the 1.33:1 or 1.37:1 aspect ratio .
secondary_definitions: ( of a motion picture ) Presented in the original aspect ratio; presented in letterbox orientation .
